Title: ZombieSEIR
Author: Eric Lofgren (adapted by Kyle Hurd)
Description: Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Recovered (SEIR) model of a population of zombies.

Parameters.Name: Infect Prob
Parameters.Description: The probability that an infected individual will infect a susceptible individual.

Parameters.Name: Infect Duration
Parameters.Description: The duration of the infection in hours.
